add.description: This is the label for the 'Add' buttons.

ai_acknow_detl.message: We are grateful to open source software

ai_adware_detl.message: Beware of popups offering unbelievable ‘lucky wins’. Block these Adware with StopAll Ads.

ai_annoying_ads_detl.message: How many times do you have to close ad windows while surfing the Internet on an average? Bet you can’t tell! It’s almost uncountable. So how about surfing the net ad free? Now that you have installed StopAll Ads, you are going to get an awesome ad-free Internet experience. No more annoying pop-ups! No slow browsing. Happy surfing!

ai_antiadblockermain_detl.message: Anti Adblocker keeps StopAll Ads from being detected as an ‘Adblocker’ on some websites.

ai_blockmar_detl.message: Internet is a potent source of malware. StopAll Ads makes browsing secure by blocking known malware domains.

ai_dactsocial_detl.message: Don’t want to see Social Media Channels? StopAll Ads can block them too!

ai_disabletrack_detl.message: You can browse privately by disabling sites from tracking your surfing history.

ai_easyprivacy_detl.message: The Net is full of website spies! Use this filter to avoid leaving digital footprints behind.

ai_helpusmake.message: Help Us Make Web Surfing Better

ai_helpusmake_detl.message: Like the way StopAll Ads Works? Well, then help us spread the word and get more people to install it. You are not the only one exasperated with the recurring ads. So why not help others have an ad-free experience as well? Share your experience and help others surf better

block_element.description: Context menu item that adds a filter which blocks the selected element

clickhide_instructions.description: Instructions shown in popup UI before it disapears, when "Block element" action is executed
clickhide_instructions.message: After closing this popup, click (or right-click) an element on the page.

description.description: Note: this cannot be longer than 132 characters
description.message: SAY GOODBYE TO ADS! Browse Safely. Optimize Surfing.

disabled_for_site.description: Popup balloon label to disable blocking

disabled_for_these_domains.message: StopAll Ads is disabled for the domains listed below. You can add a domain either via the StopAll Ads icon in the address bar or by typing the domain (not a URL) in the box and clicking the "Add domain" button.

easy_create_filter.description: Action in popup UI to add a filter which blocks an element selected from the current page

enable_only_the.message: Enable only the filter lists you need. Too many can make your browser unresponsive.

enabled_for_site.description: Popup balloon label to enable blocking

filter_must_follow_syntax.message: Your filter must follow the StopAll Ads filter syntax.

filters_subscription_lastDownload_invali.message: Failed, not a valid filters list

firstRun_acceptableAdsExplanation.message: We'd like to encourage websites to use straightforward, unobtrusive advertising. That's why we've established strict guidelines to identify acceptable ads, which are shown under default settings. If you still want to block every ad you can disable this in a few seconds.

firstRun_filterlistsReinitializedWarning.message: It seems that an issue caused all filters to be removed and we were unable to restore a backup. Therefore we had to reset your filters and Acceptable Ads settings. Please check your filter lists and Acceptable Ads settings in the StopAll Ads options.

firstRun_legacySafariWarning.message: You are using an old version of Safari which is not supported by StopAll Ads. It might not work correctly or impair the user experience on some websites. We strongly recommend to either update to Safari 6.1.1 or higher (on OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion), or Safari 7.0.1 or higher (on OS X 10.9 Mavericks), or to use the latest version of Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome or Opera.

firstRun_title.message: StopAll Ads has been installed successfully

found_a_bug.message: Found a bug? Please file a request here.

global_filter_cssproperty_nodomain.message: No active domain specified for CSS property filter

global_filter_elemhide_duplicate_id.message: Only one ID of the element to be hidden can be specified

global_filter_elemhide_nocriteria.message: No criteria specified to recognize the element to be hidden

global_notification_antiadblock_message.message: This site has been known to show targeted messages to StopAll Ads users. Do you want StopAll Ads to hide targeted messages?

global_remove_subscription_warning.message: Do you really want to remove this subscription?

global_subscription_invalid_location.message: Filter list location is neither a valid URL nor a valid file name.

invalid_css_selector.message: $selector$ is not a valid CSS selector

last_updated_at.description: e.g. Last updated at 3:00pm on Apr 1, 2011

line.description: Prepended to error messages to indicate the line number (e.g. "Line 42: Some error on this line")

name_devbuild.description: Extension name to be shown for development builds. Note: this cannot be longer than 45 characters.

notification_open_all.message: Open all links from this notification

notification_with_buttons.message: Click 'OK' to open all links in this notification.

notification_without_buttons.message: Click on the notification to open all links in it.

options_short.description: Link to the options page from the popup balloon.

remove_button.description: This is the label for the 'Remove selected' buttons.

safari_content_blocker.description: Switch between classic and Safari's Content Blocking

safari_restart.description: Shown next to the option for Safai Content Blockers if disabled in order to indicate that a restart is required

show_devtools_panel.message: Show 'StopAll Ads' panel in the developer tools

stats_Enable_web_protection.description: Enable web protection for safe browsing.
stats_Enable_web_protection.message: Enable web protection for safe browsing.

stats_label_page.description: This shows the number of blocked requests on a specific page in the popup.

stats_label_total.description: This shows the total number of blocked requests in the popup.

stats_over.description: For some numbers the stats share message will say 'I blocked over 123 ads' instead of 'I blocked 123 ads'. This is a reference to the 'over 9000' meme. This string can be translated simply with '$number$' if that meme isn't known to the speakers of the language or if the resulting sentence would sound weird otherwise.

stats_report.description: Title for the stats section in the popup.

stats_sav_description.description: Get complete protection against viruses and other malware threats in real-time.
stats_sav_description.message: Get complete protection against viruses and other malware threats in real-time.

stats_share_download.description: Label for link to stopallads.com that is attached when the user wants to share the stats on Facebook.

stats_share_message.description: This message will be posted to social networks if the user decides to share the stats.
stats_share_message.message: I blocked $number$ ads and trackers thanks to StopAll Ads.

stats_share_title.description: Label for social media buttons sharing the number of blocked ads

stats_show_iconnumber.description: Toggle for displaying the number of blocked ads in the icon.

stats_title.description: Title for the stats section in the popup.

stats_tweakpass_description.description: Secure your Passwords with world's strongest AES encryption technology.
stats_tweakpass_description.message: Secure your Passwords with world's strongest AES encryption technology.

stats_vpn_description.description: Protect your online privacy & secure your WiFi connection with ultra fast VPN.
stats_vpn_description.message: Protect your online privacy & secure your WiFi connection with ultra fast VPN.

subscriptionSelection_subscriptionSelect.message: Please choose a filter subscription from the list:

unexpected_filter_list_header.description: Error message shown when the user attempts to add a custom filter that has the format of a header (e.g. "[StopAll Ads 2.0]") which are only allowed in filter lists
unexpected_filter_list_header.message: Filter list headers aren't allowed here
